abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL # 202                 INTRODUCED BY: ALDERMAN JOSEPH VOLLMER An ordinance to repeal Ordinance No. 64210 authorizing a lease agreement with the Saint Louis Public Schools Gateway Institute of Technology and terminating said lease agreement dated June 9, 1998, and authorizing and directing the Mayor and Comptroller of the City of St. Louis to execute, upon receipt of and in consideration of the sum of  One Dollar ($1.00) and other good and valuable consideration, a Quit Claim Deed to remise, release and forever quit-claim unto The Metropolitan St. Louis Sewer District certain City-owned property which property is known as 5151 Northrup Avenue and which consists of Lot E through M in Block 8 of the Sublette's Subdivision in Block 3998-D.
